name: Limited Edition - Theo Adams Company  T-Shirts
description:
Limited Edition Theo Adams Company T-Shirts

BACK IN STOCK FOR A LIMTED TIME- WHEN THEY ARE GONE THEY ARE GONE FOREVER All proceeds from the sale of these T-Shirts will go towards the creation of The Theo Adams Company's new production 'ENTERTAINMENT'. Unisex T-shirts. Printed on Bamboo fabric which is naturally antibacterial, it’s softer to the touch yet it is more durable than cotton, and it’s much more ecologically sustainable.
With thanks to David Sims and Kate Moross for helping to create this special item.

name: Theo Adams Company Japan Tour 9 Days Of Cry Out / DVD
description: In Stock at >>Short Long Story WEB SHOP CLICK LINK TO BUY ------------------------------------------- ‘9 Days of Cry Out’ is a documentary film which captured the drama behind the scenes of the production and the struggle between 2 very different cultures. Directed by Toshinori Tanaka

name: 4 Signed Theo Adams Company Postcards from Cry Out - Limited Edition
description:
A pack of 4 Limited Edition Postcards from Theo Adams Company's new project 'Cry Out...'

Signed on the back of the image by Theo Adams

We are an unfunded company. All proceeds from the sale of these Postacrds will go towards production costs to bring Theo Adams Company's new production "CRY OUT..." to the world.

With thanks to David Sims
